content:
Wario was placed inside the cloning machine, and the citizens eagerly awaited the creation of his clone. They licked their lips in anticipation, eager to taste the flesh of the man who had exploited their fears and weaknesses for his own gain.

However, something unexpected happened as the cloning process began. The machine malfunctioned, and Wario's consciousness became entangled with the clone that was being created.

Wario found himself trapped inside the clone, experiencing the world through its senses, but unable to control its actions. He was horrified as he watched the citizens devour his clone, realizing too late the terrible fate that awaited him.

In the end, Wario's greed and exploitation led to his ultimate downfall. He had taken advantage of the fears and weaknesses of others, never realizing that his actions would have consequences. He was a cautionary tale, a reminder of the dangers of greed and the importance of doing what is right.
